attributes.action: Is this Government an ass justice means no prison because of the lack of prison places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the first act of the new Jusice Ministry has been to virtually abolish prison as a punishment for non violent crime what is the deterrent. Community service now is meaningless since the offender cannot be sent to prison for breaching his conditions of sentence so what is the punisment pat them on the head

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
